assistGreetAttempt.text: It appears Chris has missed your call.

assistGreetExplain.text: Things I can assist with are...
Check if Chris is available or...
Also,,, you can try again later, if you prefer.....

random.text: So... what can I help you with?
Am I able to assist you with anything today?

assistGreetHangUpPrep.text: It appears we're having some issues with this current call.
You can try back again anytime, I'm always here to assist.

random.text: I hope you have a good day.
I'm doing great today, I hope you are as well.
Wonderful,,,, plus my boss just gave me a promotion recently.
I'm fantastic today, plus the weather has been so nice.

digWhoAreYou.text: Oh, hi, my name is Liz D Wil, you can call me Liz.

random.text: I'm Liz Wil, the one and only. Of course.
I'm Liz Dee, L O L, having fun yet?
